Articles.Content:
Hello to all Kerbalnauts, really i don't like this game

----

102 hours in 12 days.... really i don't like it

Welcome aboard.

Well, good you don't like the game. If you liked it, you may forget about having a life beyond Kerbin (whenever I can, I keep spending 12-15 hrs/day about KSP, though not playing all time).
No, that's perfectly normal. Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay!

Once you KSP, you can never stop KSP.

And welcome to the forums!
